org.jruyi.common

Interface CharsetCodec.IFactory

  • Enclosing class:
    CharsetCodec

    public static interface CharsetCodec.IFactory
    A factory class to create instances of ICharsetCodec. It is used to separate the implementation provider from the API module.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ICharsetCodec get()
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the platform's default charset.
      ICharsetCodec get(Charset charset)
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the specified charset.
      ICharsetCodec get(String charsetName)
      Gets an instance of ICharsetCodec using the specified charset.

    • Method Detail
